name: Operational Ships
description:
Use the WASD and the left click to play this game

Eliminate enemys, and pick up power ups, and "Math Operations" to progress in the Level.

Get 100 energy to progress in the level, and and fight with the final boss.

Do not use 2 same upgrades. :3

Developers: David Olivares, Jhon Chalco
